page.title: 12A Child's Life,1985,Bradford
page.content: I live at 1048 Bolton Road.I go to Bolton Lane First School.At home I make up games and play them with my brother.I also play with my Sindy dolls.I play the recorder and I am learning the piano.I go to the park quite a lot and usually take my roller boots. I like my house because it is near to school and I live next door to Robert and Nicola.I don't like my house because it is near a main road and I can't get to my friend's house without being taken across the road. My school is very nice and we do lots of nice things.My favourite is PE or gymnastics.I also like Nelson Grammar and Peak Maths but I don't like 8-a-Day.We go on some nice trips.I will soon be leaving to go to Wellington Middle School.
